comment._content: Gerard Neyenhouse a recruit for the Brooklyn Dodgers heading toward their off season training camp in Georgia. Reported in the New York Times on February 21, 1914. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F50E11FE3D5E13...

comment._content: this ship also made the news there in 1913 query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=FA0D1EF9385F13...

comment._content:
A Bain/LOC photo of Charles Ebbets, Jr., also taken aboard the "City of Macon" -- and on the same day:
